tool_description: This API returns the past and next perihelions for all the space object monitored by Astrometry.ch.  Progress in percentage of the solar system celestial bodies.
name: astrometry.ch perihelion astronomy
title: astrometry.ch perihelion astronomy

api_list.name: Base endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://astrometry-ch-perihelion-astronomy.p.rapidapi.comhttp://astrometry.ch:5000/perihelion/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "astrometry-ch-perihelion-astronomy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://astrometry-ch-perihelion-astronomy.p.rapidapi.comhttp://astrometry.ch:5000/perihelion/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
